name: R1-D1
overview: R1-D1 (a pun on the droid R2-D2 from Star Wars) is a surveillance robot, that has to fight other robots which have turned evil form some reason. So much for the background story. To fulfill its mission, R1-D1 has to fight through a labyrinth of platforms, collecting keys and opening the doors of the corresponding colors, in order to finally escape via reaching the very right of the bottom platform ("OUT"). When this is accomplished, you start again, only the enemy robots become faster each round. Published in Your Commodore 1986/11 (Tape #00) / Digital Marketing PD #039, Starlight #2.
